import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-assignments', standalone: false, templateUrl: './assignments.html', styleUrl: './assignments.scss' }) export class Assignments { showAssignments = true; // In your assignment.component.ts selectedTab: 'create' | 'questions' | 'manage' = 'create'; }

Assignment Management

Create assignments, manage questions, and control visibility.
